attributes.action: Help Change The Councils Rules On Plot Sizes For Graves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A mother whose son's grave was cut in half under 'health and safety' rules is outraged at being billed £250 bill for the work.

Anna Greenwood spent months battling the local authority's demand to halve her 14-year-old son Daniel's plot from 6ft to 3ft.

This is just one example of what they are doing at the moment.

The rules need to be changed, people do not bury their loved ones just so people can walk across them. Generaly there are paths around for disabled access, so this should not be an issue.

The rule of only being able to use 3ft of the 6ft plot you have paid for needs to change.

Please help us make this possible

Thankyou.
